content: Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The current featured article on Wikipedia is about the short-beaked echidna, a species of echidna found in Australia and eastern New Guinea. It is covered in fur and spines, has a distinctive snout, and uses a specialized tongue to catch insects. The article also discusses its behavior, mating habits, and threats to its population. Other sections of the page include news updates, recently featured articles, and information about Wikipedia itself.

Links: ['Jump to content (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page#bodyContent)', 'Main page (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Main_Page)', 'Contents (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Contents)', 'Current events (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Portal:Current_events)', 'Random article (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Special:Random)']
Determine exactly one command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Command write_to_file returned: File written to successfully.
